title: Episode 183: The Shoal Creek Buried Treasure
description:
Beneath the lush live oak trees in beautiful Austin, Texas lies a temptation that has captured the hearts of men for centuries. Buried under the dirt and grass lies a trove of riches beyond any of our wildest dreams. But such treasures come at a price and some men, driven wild by greed, have paid the ultimate price.

Click here for information on our upcoming tour and to purchase tickets!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
